content.raw: @iche033 Has the [example comms reduction script](#!/osrf/srcsim/raw/296baf70dbd5c48426c2fa088c5de2ccbdab68fe/scripts/src_tc.rb) been tested on the CloudSim setup?  Could you please post instructions for using it (ie, the right interface and IP to test it, and should it be running in the docker container?)  Every time I've tried it it prevents anything at all coming through, regardless of latency and bandwidth throttling settings.  I also haven't had any luck running it just on the connection between machines on my local network, as in the post above.  Thanks in advance.
content.html: @iche033 Has the example comms reduction script been tested on the CloudSim setup? Could you please post instructions for using it (ie, the right interface and IP to test it, and should it be running in the docker container?) Every time I've tried it it prevents anything at all coming through, regardless of latency and bandwidth throttling settings. I also haven't had any luck running it just on the connection between machines on my local network, as in the post above. Thanks in advance.
